message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price.
Thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'd like to propose a lower price of $100.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make sure I get a fair price for my product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $130 for it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe we can find a price closer to my budget. I would like to suggest a price of $115 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your budget, but I still need to get a better price for my product. I'm willing to compromise, but I need at least $135 for it.
I understand your position, but I am still aiming to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $125 for the product.
I'm still not getting the price I want, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll consider selling the product for $140, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I am still looking for a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.
I've already met you halfway twice, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'll give you one last chance to meet my minimum price of $145, or I'll have to consider other options.
Considering our previous discussions, I am confident that we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. I would like to propose a final price of $140 for the product.
